arts.ttl: Liverpool star 'fought until the last minute' to join Real Madrid in the summer
arts.sum: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk reportedly fought until the last minute to move to Real Madrid during the summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid starlet issues injury update after being ruled out vs Liverpool
arts.sum: Real Madrid lost promising teenager Franco Mastantuono to an injury ahead of their UEFA Champions League clash against Liverpool. The 18-year-old wonderkid, who arrived from River Plate in the summer, had become a regular starter on the right flank for Xabi Alonso. However, Mastantuono did not train with the rest of the squad on Monday, […] The post Real Madrid starlet issues injury update after being ruled out vs Liverpool appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural near Anfield vandalised before Real Madrid tie
arts.sum: Word ‘rat’ daubed on mural and white paint thrown on it Workmen clean it up before Champions League match A mural of Trent Alexander-Arnold has been vandalised before his return to Anfield with Real Madrid. The former Liverpool full-back is expected to feature in the Real squad for Tuesday’s Champions League game less than six months after leaving his boyhood club for Spain. Alexander-Arnold’s decision to depart at the end of his contract was met with anger by a section of the Liverpool fanbase, who booed the right-back. The large mural near Anfield was unveiled in 2019 following Liverpool’s Champions League victory and was vandalised after the news Alexander-Arnold would leave, with the word “rat” daubed on it. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: “Litmus test” – Spanish media hype up Liverpool vs Real Madrid, Reds need to beware old foe
arts.sum: Real Madrid’s trip to Anfield to take on Liverpool tonight will be a “litmus test” for Xabi Alonso’s developing project at the club. That’s according to journalist Edu Aguirre, via Mundo Deportivo. He believes that the Champions League clash will be a test for the Spanish giants. arts.ttl: Father of Liverpool's Alexis Mac Allister Reveals Feelings Over Real Madrid Transfer Links
arts.sum: Carlos Mac Allister spoke in an interview with Spanish publication AS, discussing the rumours surrounding his son and Real Madrid. Alexis' father, Carlos Mac Allister, spoke about the rumors and knows his son must perform competently to be linked to the Spanish giants.
